amk_gui module#

This class defines the GUI elements for AMKAPP

class amk_gui.DeviceSelector(master, controller, selected_callback=None, update_devices_callback=None, default_value='', pos_x=12, pos_y=4, state='readonly')#

Bases: object

GUI element for selecting the AMK device to work with.

notify_device_changed(event)#

Set the app’s active device to the selected device.

refresh_with()#

Update DeviceSelector with the current available devices.
